mapper.insert: insert into TEKeyVehicles (KeyVehiclesID, VehiclesHolderCertID, VehiclesHolderName, VechiclesNumber, VechiclesTypeValue, InsuranceInf, EnterpriseUSCcode, YearCheckInf, NetGridID, Contact, Remarks ) values (#{keyVehiclesID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{vehiclesHolderCertID,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vehiclesHolderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vechiclesNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vechiclesTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{insuranceInf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseUSCcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yearCheckInf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netGridID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update TEKeyVehicles set VehiclesHolderCertID = #{vehiclesHolderCertID,jdbcType=CHAR}, VehiclesHolderName = #{vehiclesHolderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VechiclesNumber = #{vechiclesNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VechiclesTypeValue = #{vechiclesTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, InsuranceInf = #{insuranceInf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EnterpriseUSCcode = #{enterpriseUSCcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, YearCheckInf = #{yearCheckInf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NetGridID = #{netGridID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where KeyVehiclesID = #{keyVehiclesID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select KeyVehiclesID, VehiclesHolderCertID, VehiclesHolderName, VechiclesNumber, VechiclesTypeValue, InsuranceInf, EnterpriseUSCcode, YearCheckInf, NetGridID, Contact, Remarks from TEKeyVehicles where KeyVehiclesID = #{keyVehiclesID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT t1.*,t2.VechiclesTypeName,t3.NetGridName FROM TEKeyVehicles t1 left join TECODEVechiclesType t2 on t1.VechiclesTypeValue=t2.VechiclesTypeValue left join TENetGrid t3 on t1.NetGridID=t3.NetGridID where t1.KeyVehiclesID = #{id}
select KeyVehiclesID, VehiclesHolderCertID, VehiclesHolderName, VechiclesNumber, VechiclesTypeValue, InsuranceInf, EnterpriseUSCcode, YearCheckInf, NetGridID, Contact, Remarks from TEKeyVehicles
